alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Queens; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 18 at 1:21PM EST until November 19 at 9:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Kings (Brooklyn), Northern Queens and Southern Queens Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
